alert.note: Alert for Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:20PM EDT until July 27 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTY... At 420 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ebony, or 10 miles northeast of Warrenton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Littleton, Macon, Wise, Lake Gaston and Southpointe And Morningstar Marinas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
